title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Drain spaghetti and combine immediately with egg mixture and pancetta.
Serve with extra cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 2 hours.
Cook tomatoes and spices in a pan to make sauce.
Add grilled chicken to sauce and simmer.
Stir in cream and cook for 5 minutes before serving.
